title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Join Our Friends
body: Join Our Friends       Friends of Saratoga Battlefield (FOSB) Want to help support Saratoga National Historical Park directly, but not sure how?  Become a member of Friends of Saratoga Battlefield!  Your membership will assist FOSB in sponsoring special programs and events like our Junior Ranger program, "Music on the Menu" historical music presentations, college internships, and more.  To learn more about the Friends of Saratoga Battlefield, please visit their website. A downloadable FOSB membership application is also available. (.pdf file size 229 kb)
